attributes.action: stop telling lies about globe warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: its just an excuse to jump on the band wagon,if they would listen to the scientists that have done the proper research on the polar icecaps they would know that this is a thing that occures about every 5000 years,and is caused by naturel events,as proved by core samples from the ice caps.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
